titles.title: A bill to amend the Animal Welfare Act to prohibit the unnecessary surgery or alteration of animals.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture.

committee.subcommittee: Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 6/3/1987--Introduced. Amends the Animal Welfare Act to prohibit the performance on animals of injuring or disfiguring surgery.
